turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I need to order a pizza from Bella Luna and I need to get two pizzas that are both large size.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I need to make one of meat lovers and one of veggie lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can place the order for you. before i confirm your order, are you ok with regular crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. the order for 2 large pizzas, 1 meat lovers and 1 veggie lovers, both with extra cheese comes out to $24.99.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now, or did i need to change anything.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. Place the order now, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. i've placed the order. it'll be ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i've sent you the receipt as well. did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That Nope. That's it. Thank you.
